pullRequest.title: Update bytecode verification to support OpenJDK VarHandles
pullRequest.bodyText:
For OpenJDK VarHandles, the invokevirtual calls to the VarHandle
polymorphic methods are rewritten to the invokehandle bytecode in
ClassFileOracle (#10557). Bytecode verification has been updated to
handle this conversion. These changes are identical to the existing
MethodHandle handling.
Related: #7352
Co-authored-by: Jack Lu Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh sbabneet@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: is this applicable to both the JBinvokehandle and the  JBinvokehandlegeneric cases?

commit.message:
Update bytecode verification to support OpenJDK VarHandles

For OpenJDK VarHandles, the invokevirtual calls to the VarHandle
polymorphic methods are rewritten to the invokehandle bytecode in
ClassFileOracle (#10557). Bytecode verification has been updated to
handle this conversion. These changes are identical to the existing
MethodHandle handling.

Co-authored-by: Jack Lu <Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com>
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>
